documents.document:
"THE MAGIC OF OUR FACE"

....... ........ ........ ........."SMILE IT WONDERS YOUR FACE".
Try and Explore you will certainly make a difference not only in your life but others too.

....The Wonderful Gift that carries a WARMTH for everyone that U do CARE 4 them.

....A Ray OF Hope For A Better Tomorrow that WARDS OFF your sorrow and gives u the courage to laugh at life .

....A Hundred Dollar worth which gives u the pleasure of being one among the ....

So what are you waiting for FRIENDS...u too can be a magician GIVE A SMILE ..
ALL IT TAKES A FEW SECONDS OF UR DAILY SCHEDULE IN TURN GIVES U A FEEL THAT U R AMONG THE .....
".............. ALL AND SERVE ALL WITH A MAGIC ON YOUR FACE............."

ANYWAYS


People are unreasonable,illogical and selfcentered.
LOVE THEM ANYWAY.
If you do good,people will accuse you of selfish ulterior motives.
DO GOOD ANYWAY.
If you are successful,you will win false friends and true enemies.
SUCCEED ANYWAY.
Honesty and frankness make you vulnerable.
BE HONEST AND FRANK ANYWAY.
The good you do today will be forgotten tomorrow.
DO GOOD ANYWAY.
The biggest people with the biggest ideas can be shot
down by the smallest people with the smallest minds.
THINK BIG ANYWAY.
People favor underdogs but follow only top dogs.
FIGHT FOR SOME UNDERDOGS ANYWAYS.
What you spent years building may be destroyed overnight.
BUILD ANYWAY.

LET GO AND LET GOD

As children bring their broken toys
with tears for us to mend.

I brought my broken dreams to God,
because He was my friend.

But then,instead of leaving Him
in peace to work alone,

I hung around and tried to help
with ways that were my own.

At last I snatched them back and cried,
"How can you be so slow?"

"My child," He said,"What could I do?
You never did let go."

RISK

To laugh is to risk appearing fool.
To weep is to risk appearing sentimental.
To reach for another is to risk involvement.
To expose your feelings is to risk exposing your true self.
To place your ideas,your dreams,before a crowd is to risk their loss.
To love is to risk not being loved in return.
To live is to risk dying.
To believe is to risk despair.
To try is to risk failure.
But risks must be taken,because the greatest hazard i life is to risk nothing.
The people who risk nothing,do nothing,have nothing,are nothing.
They may avoid suffering and sorrow,but they cannot learn,feel,change,grow.love.live.
Chained by their attitudes they are slaves,they have forfeited their freedom.
Only a person who risks and takes up responsibility is free.

So when faced with a problem....
DARE to try.
Dare to love.So when faced with a problem....
DARE to try.
Dare to love.
Dare to make a commitment.
Dare to take a risk .
If u don't dare to take a risk,you'll never get ahead.
You'll never solve ur your problems.
Dare to make a commitment.
Dare to take a risk .
If u don't dare to take a risk,you'll never get ahead.
You'll never solve ur your problems.

Caring Touch

Treat them tenderly...
They can get killed pretty quickly.
Treat them gently...
They can be bruised in infancy.
Treat them respectfully...
They could be the most valuable things that ever came into your life.
Treat them protectively...
Don't let them get away.
Treat them nutritionally...
Feed them ,and feed them well.
Treat them antiseptically...
Don't let them get infected with the germs of negative thoughts.
Treat them responsibly!
Respond!Act!Do something with them!

Think how do u treat good ideas?Is this the same way?
That's how we should act on them.Isn't !

THE GREAT WORDS

When you've exhausted all the possibilities,remember this :YOU HAVEN"T !
Nobody is a total failure if he dares to try to do something worthwhile.
Never let a problem become an excuse.
God's delays are not God's denials.
Today's decisions are tomorrow's realities.
The one battle most people lose is the battle over the fear of failure...
try...
start...
begin...
and you'll be assured ,you won the first round.

FAILURE DOESN'T MEAN...

Failure doesn't mean U are a failure....
it does mean U haven't succeeded yet.
Failure doesn't mean U have accomplished nothing.....
it does mean U have learned something.
Failure doesn't mean U have been a fool.....
it does mean U had a lot of faith.
Failure doesn't mean U have been disgraced.....
it does mean U are willing to try.
Failure doesn't mean U don't have it.....
it does mean U have to do something in a different way.
Failure doesn't mean U are inferior.....
it does mean U are not perfect.
Failure doesn't mean U have wasted your life.....
it does mean U have a reason to start afresh.
Failure doesn't mean U should give up.....
it does mean U must try harder.[/b]
Failure doesn't mean U will never make it......
it does mean it will take a little longer time.
Failure doesn't mean God has abandoned you.....
it does mean "God has a better idea for YOU!"

MOTIVATION

A successful person is one who can lay a firm foundation
with the bricks that others throw at him.

INSPIRATION

A decision is made with the brain.
A commitment is made with the heart.
Therefore
"A commitment is much deeper and binding than a decision."

REALITY OF HUMANITY

"HANDS THAT SERVE ARE HOLIER THAN LIPS THAT PRAY"
TRY TO SERVE IN HIS NAME AS FAR AS U CAN .

LUCK

He worked by day and suffered through night...
He gave up play and all the pleasures of life...
And when he won people called it luck...
But he said smiling with a gentle voice ...
He who tastes the spice of life can never ...
call it luck as it comes to those who believe...
Success blesses those who continously work...
with a burning desire towards whatever they aim...
towards whereever they stand spreading the message...
of Love and peace,courage and faith with an everlasting ...
Smile on their face ,facing the toughest times ...
proving SUCCESS never favours u by the wealth or by the fame...
but truely with ur dedication and simplicity.

NEVER REJECT

Never reject a possibility b'se U see something wrong with it !

BETTER TO DO SOMETHING IMPERFECTLY THAN TO DO NOTHING FLAWLESS.

Never reject a possibilty b'se U won't get the credit !

DECIDE TODAY WOULD U RATHER SATISFY UR EGO ----OR ENJOY THE FRUIT OF SUCCESS ?

Never reject an idea b'se it's impossible !

THINGS THT R IMPOSSIBLE TODAY R POSSIBLE 2MRW.

Never reject an idea b'se Ur mind is already made up !

NOBODY IS PERFECT NEITHER I NOR U ,SO BETTER CHANGE PLANS WHILE STILL IN PORT,THAN TO SET SAIL AND SINK AT SEA.

A RAY OF HOPE !!!

When faced with a Mountain.....
I I'll keep on striving until i climb over,
Find a pass through,tunnel underneath----
or simply stay and turn the mountain...
.... ......Into a Gold mine , with .....
"GOD'S HELP ! "

VISION

Yesterday is already a Dream...
Tomorrow is only a vision...
But today's well lived makes...
Every yesterday a dream of Happiness...
And every tomorrow a vision of Hope !

A Wish For U

Time & tide don't wait for anyone....
we should do our utmost to achieve the object before us.
And my best wishes to all u there...


Wishing U not a smile but laughter
Not just happiness but pure joy
Not just wealth but God's treasure and
Not just silence but God's peace.
Wishing U 12 months of Happiness,52 weeks of Fun,365 days of Success,8760 hours of Good Health,
525,600 min of Blessings & 31,536,000sec of Joy.
KEEP SMILING....

THE FIVE THINGS

There r 5 things u need in Life,Good Work,Good Friends,Good Food,
Good Sleep & Good Luck.Whatever U think it's upto U..
God will either give U what U ask orsomething far better than what U wished.
Keep on praying and be thankful 'coz......
God's answers are wiser than our prayers.
